summary.span: 實作 並且提供由數值 (傳遞序列化物件的複本) 所封送處理之可遠端使用元件的基底實作。

span.span: Implements and provides the base implementation for remotable components that are marshaled by value (a copy of the serialized object is passed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件可以包含在容器中。A component can be contained in a container. 每個元件的容器中，容器會建立站台，用來管理元件。For each component in a container, the container creates a site that it uses to manage the component. 元件互動主要是透過將容器提供其容器，這是特定容器中，每個元件的資訊的存放庫。The component interacts with its container primarily through a container-provided , which is a repository of container-specific, per-component information.

para.span: 當您繼承自這個類別時，您可以覆寫， ，和方法。

span.span: When you inherit from this class, you can override the , , and the methods.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關您可以使用設計工具服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[設計階段架構](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4881917b-628f-4689-b872-472e4f8a4e3a)。For more information on designer services you can use, see [Design-Time Architecture](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4881917b-628f-4689-b872-472e4f8a4e3a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的值，這個屬性-也就是值不是`null`，表示元件已新增至容器。A valid value for this property - that is, the value is not `null`, indicates that the component has been added to a container. 當這個屬性的值是`null`，此屬性指出從容器移除元件。When the value of this property is `null`, the property indicates that the component is being removed from a container. 不過，這個屬性不會移除從容器的元件。However, this property does not remove the component from the container.

para.span: 若要變更此行為，繼承自這個類別以及取得和設定這個屬性中。

span.span: To change this behavior, inherit from this class and get and set in this property.
